templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: We have a rewards program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. You can check your points by logging into your account here: https://www.firsttactical.com/account/login?return_url=%2Faccount%3FexternalId%3DQOdmo

templates.name: Where do you ship from?
templates.content: We ship from Modesto, CA. Let me know if you need further help. ðŸ˜Š

templates.name: Will your garments conceal my weapon?
templates.content: At this time we do not have any garments specifically designed for concealed carry however the Tactix stretch pants do offer a comfort waistband that will flex if the customer prefers to wear an IWB holster. Likewise, our woven shirts have enough body in the materials to minimize any outward printing of a CCW.

templates.name: Can I get my department or corporate logo put on your garments?
templates.content: Yes! Please call our customer service department at 855-665-3410 for more information.

templates.name: Customer Support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@firsttactical.com, or give us a call at 1-855-665-3410. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Phone Support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 1-855-665-3410 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Military/Law enforcement discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We do not offer discounts, but you will find that our high value products and pricing consistently beats that of most all competitors in the industry!

templates.name: Social Media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/firsttactical/ and FB here: https://web.facebook.com/FirstTacticalUS

templates.name: Return Policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.firsttactical.com/pages/faqs#warranty-returns

templates.name: Restock [autosend enabled]
templates.content: We're sorry the item you wanted is sold out! Please let me know the item/color/size and I'll see if I can find a date of when this may be in stock.

templates.name: Can you hem to X size?
templates.content: Yes, we can! Please give us a call at 1-855-665-3410 so our team can assist you with this. We carry unhemmed pant sizes for this exact reason, so that you can have pants custom hemmed to your desired specifications either by us directly or at a uniform retailer near you.

templates.name: Do you ship to APO/FPO?
templates.content: We ship to APO and FPO addresses. To ship to an APO or FPO address, add items to your cart and proceed to checkout. When completing your address during checkout, please make note of the city (must be entered as either "APO" or "FPO"), the state must be selected as either "AA" "AE" or "AP", you must enter your zip code. Always remember to enter your full name, grade, and PSC or unit number. If an existing shipping address automatically populates, please correct where necessary.

templates.name: Size Chart
templates.content: Happy to help you find the right size! Our clothes generally run true to size. Would you mind sharing your usual size? You can also check out our size charts here: https://www.firsttactical.com/pages/size-charts

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can find us at a store near you here: https://www.firsttactical.com/pages/global-retailer-locator

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! You can sign up for our Affiliate Program here: https://www.shareasale.com/shareasale.cfm?merchantID=101496

templates.name: Where are the Performance T-shirts made?
templates.content: The Performance T-shirts are made in Cambodia.

templates.name: Are any garments fire resistant?
templates.content: We offer a selection of 100% cotton items for men and women, including the Tactix Cotton L/S Shirt, the Tactix Cotton S/S shirt, the Cotton Job Shirt, the Cotton L/S, and the Cotton S/S polo. These are great options for fire professionals, as they will not melt or drip.

templates.name: How do I wash the apparel items?
templates.content: Turn items inside out and machine wash in cold water using mild detergent. Tumble dry on low. For items with moisture wicking properties, avoid using fabric softener.

templates.name: How do I return or exchange a gift I received?
templates.content: Gift items may be exchanged for the same item in a different size or color only. Please call our customer service team at 855-665-3410 to initiate the exchange.

templates.name: Are your women's pants considered low rise or high rise?
templates.content: The women's pants would be considered a mid rise in todays market. These are specifically designed for a uniform, professional customer as compared to fashion. We have intentionally fit the pants to allow for the many activities and performance needs of our target consumer so that they can bend, move and function in their everyday active work environment.

templates.name: Sales group
templates.content: Where are you from? If you provide your contact details (email/phone number) I'd be happy to pass it along to one of our sales reps in your area to start a conversation on how we can better serve you.

templates.name: Can I backorder?
templates.content: Sure! Please call customer service 1-855-665-3410 as they can place a backorder for you.

templates.name: Is your Mulitcam defender coming back in stock?
templates.content: As of now, we won't continue production on our Multicam defender. It's marked as closeout.

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: I'm afraid we're unable to edit orders once they've been placed. However, I can check if it's possible to cancel the order instead. If you would like to proceed with the cancelation please send me your order number and email adress as well.

templates.name: Free Shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $100. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at support@firsttactical.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Is the crotch gusseted on these pants?
templates.content: All of our pants are diamond gusseted in that area.

templates.name: Do you do custom patches?
templates.content: I'm afraid we don't make custom patches.

templates.name: What is the weight of the men's 7" operators boot size 12 ( Style 165010 )
templates.content: The Men's 7" Operator Boots weigh approximately 1.36 lbs.

templates.name: Can I combine points and code?
templates.content: Please note that only one discount code can be used per order. I'm afraid points and discount codes cannot be combined.

templates.name: Size Chart: Women - Clothes
templates.content: You can take a look at our women's size chart here: https://www.firsttactical.com/pages/womens-apparel-size-charts-24

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.firsttactical.com/collections/sale

templates.name: Size Chart: Men - Clothes
templates.content: You can take a look at our men's size chart here: https://www.firsttactical.com/pages/mens-apparel-size-charts-24

templates.name: Retroactive discount request
templates.content: Unfortunately, we cannot apply promotional codes after the order has been placed. But, the code should work for your next order.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: We offer ground and 2-day shipping. Note that free shipping promotions are for ground shipments only. To get 2-day shipping, orders must be received 10am PST.  Ground orders will be processed to ship on the following business day, unless otherwise noted. Once shipped via USPS or FedEx, orders arrive within 7-10 business days. We don't offer international shipping right now, but hopefully will in the future.

templates.name: Price Matching
templates.content: Unfortunately, at this time we do not offer price matching.
